title: Different Seasons Pt. 1: Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption
itunes:title: Different Seasons Pt. 1: Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption
itunes:subtitle: The Losers get locked up in Shawshank as they journey through Stephen King’s 1982 novellas collection, Different Seasons. Chapters include: Intro/First Experiences, The Hook/Structure and Format (11:35), Heroes and Villains (30:51), The Sem...
description:
The Losers get locked up in Shawshank as they journey through Stephen King’s 1982 novellas collection, Different Seasons. 


Chapters include: Intro/First Experiences, The Hook/Structure and Format (11:35), Heroes and Villains (30:51), The Sematary (1:07:20), Word Processor of the God (1:20:04), Poundcake! (1:30:26), King’s Dominion (1:32:59), Overall Thoughts (1:36:44), Adaptations (1:42:03), and Outro (2:03:34). 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
